_symbol_format: .TICKER YYMMDD P/C STRIKE  (positive qty = buy, negative = sell)
rationale: Wide strikes, high probability of profit

entry_conditions.notes: Short strangle: sell OTM put + OTM call. Wider range than straddle but less premium. UNDEFINED RISK. Best in highest IV environments.

pnl_drivers.max_loss: UNLIMITED on upside, substantial on downside
pnl_drivers.primary_driver: Theta decay â€” both options lose time value daily
pnl_drivers.secondary_driver: IV crush â€” short vega profits from volatility contraction

greeks_profile.theta: positive â€” both short options decay
greeks_profile.vega: negative â€” profits from IV decrease
greeks_profile.delta: near neutral (slightly directional based on strikes chosen)
greeks_profile.gamma: negative â€” UNDEFINED RISK, accelerates on big moves

pnl_drivers.ideal_scenario: Price stays between short strikes, IV contracts, both options expire worthless.
